alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 116 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tyrone to 8 miles southwest of Trinchera. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Trinchera around 130 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Branson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds and blowing dust will be likely well away from any rain or lightning.
